results.title: My second home
results.creator_credit: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Memet Gunes was one of the lucky few people in his village in Turkey to receive an education. When he migrated to Australia with his family he found a place full of possibility and opportunity.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Home away from home
results.creator_credit: Umit Ugur, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Unlike other immigrants, Umit Ugur didn’t move to Australia in 1981 for economic reasons, instead he migrated here because of love.

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Dad, I made it!
results.creator_credit: Figen Hasimoglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A promise to her father lead Figen Hasimoglu from her homeland of Turkey to Australia, in search of a better life and a chance for a good education.

results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.

results.title: Australyaya Gelisiminhikayesi = Coming to Australia
results.creator_credit: Riza Guclu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Riza Guclu moved to Australia with his family, he was looking for a better life, like most immigrants. With that in mind, he learnt what he need to help him succeed.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Riza Guclu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Where Do I Belong?
results.creator_credit: Rita el-Khoury, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Rita el-Khoury travels to Lebanon every year. She calls Australia and Lebanon her home but it wasn’t until she was caught in the middle of the 2006 Israeli bombing of Beiruit that she fully appreciated what that meant.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rita el-Khoury, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Rita el-Khoury travels to Lebanon every year. She calls Australia and Lebanon her home but it wasn’t until she was caught in the middle of the 2006 Israeli bombing of Beiruit that she fully appreciated what that meant.

results.title: The Spaces in Between
results.creator_credit: Carla Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Carla Pascoe traces her family’s ancestry from Lebanon and contemplates the mysterious circumstances of her great grandfather’s migration, as well as the undocumented moments of her family’s history.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Carla Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Carla Pascoe traces her family’s ancestry from Lebanon and contemplates the mysterious circumstances of her great grandfather’s migration, as well as the undocumented moments of her family’s history.
description_for_label: Carla Pascoe traces her family’s ancestry from Lebanon and contemplates the mysterious circumstances of her great grandfather’s migration, as well as the undocumented moments of her family’s history.

results.title: Jidi
results.creator_credit: Stephen Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Stephen Pascoe’s grandfather was diagnosed with cancer, he and his sister decided to preserve his memories by filming an interview with him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
